channel.title: ProRevo719 - Staff open!
channel.description:
Welcome to ProRevo, where we have great training, wonderful staff, (Which are open - don't ask; you will be banned. No applications, either. Will be picked upon dedication, advertising, etc.)
We have every working boss, and great shops. Come try us! Register on forums - http://prorevo.no-ip.org/ProRevo/forum/
And play on Webclient! - http://prorevo.no-ip.org/ProRevo/game.php
Join us today, and you won't regret it, you have nothing to lose!
- Noobforlunch & Tyler

item.title: ProRevo719 - Staff open!
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

You always need pictures, without pics, it doesn’t strive players to play… as much

Read full topic

item.title: ProRevo719 - Staff open!
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Hello, and welcome to the forums :).

I would suggest you take a look at the thread I am quoting this from, by our moderator Flame_. It will help you construct a better advertisement, which in turn helps yourself out by bringing in more curious players!

[quote=“Flame_, post:1, topic:521514”]Guidelines/Ideals:

[ul][li]Although providing some sort of media is not required, it will make your advertisement more appealing, and ultimately draw more players to your server.[/li][/ul][/quote]

Hope to see this thread grow, goodluck!

Read full topic
